DataElement.preferredDefinition: The body mass divided by the square of the body height expressed in units of kg/m2 calculated for youth 2-20 years of age.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Per Age And Sex Youth Body Mass Index
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._For each, generally denoting a ratio._How long something has existed; elapsed time since birth._An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition. It is used to conjoin a word with a word, a clause with a clause, or a sentence with a sentence._The assemblage of physical properties or qualities by which male is distinguished from female; the physical difference between male and female; the distinguishing peculiarity of male or female._The time of life between childhood and maturity.  This period overlaps with adolescence._One of the anthropometric measures of body mass; it has the highest correlation with skinfold thickness or body density.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

It is used to conjoin a word with a word, a clause with a clause, or a sentence with a sentence.:The assemblage of physical properties or qualities by which male is distinguished from female; the physical difference between male and female; the distinguishing peculiarity of male or female.:The time of life between childhood and maturity.  This period overlaps with adolescence.:One of the anthropometric measures of body mass; it has the highest correlation with skinfold thickness or body density.

Concepts.definition: For each, generally denoting a ratio.
How long something has existed; elapsed time since birth.
An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition. It is used to conjoin a word with a word, a clause with a clause, or a sentence with a sentence.
The assemblage of physical properties or qualities by which male is distinguished from female; the physical difference between male and female; the distinguishing peculiarity of male or female.
The time of life between childhood and maturity.  This period overlaps with adolescence.
An individual's weight in kilograms divided by the square of the height in meters.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A calculated numerical quantity that represents an individual's weight to height ratio.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: One of the anthropometric measures of body mass; it has the highest correlation with skinfold thickness or body density.:A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

Concepts.definition: An individual's weight in kilograms divided by the square of the height in meters.
A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.
